short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hianchor offical extension for getting highlights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the official extension used to capture highlights from Amazon Kindle page.
Only available to usefor Highligh Anchor subscribers.

We are developing new features to help you sync your precious highlights and quotes from any places such as Amazon Kindle, blog, RSS, pdf file to our centralized system. From there, you can sync them to your favorite note-taking applications such as Notion, Obsidian, Evernote, and more
